name: Silvally
description: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.

abilities.name: RKS System
abilities.effect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.  This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Silvally.
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
